name: Sammelt Brennesseln, die deutsche Baumwolle! LCCN2004666104 - from Commons

desc.html: English:  Title: Sammelt Brennesseln, die deutsche Baumwolle! Abstract: Poster shows a spool of thread on a nettle stalk surrounded by nettle leaves; in background the Bavarian flag. Text: Collect stinging nettles, the German cotton. Bavarian Nettle Center, Munich. Physical description: 1 print (poster) : lithograph, color ; 91 x 60 cm. Notes: Fritz Wolffhügel, München.; Forms part of: Rehse-Archiv für Zeitgeschichte und Publizistik.; Title from item.
